Verses: 1 pinbu, Naan Pudhiya Vaanaththaiyum Pudhiya Boomiyaiyum Kanden; Mundhina Vaanamum Mundhina Boomiyum Ozhindhupoyina; Samuththiramum Illaamarpoyitru.

2 yovaanaagiya Naan, Pudhiya Erusalemaagiya Parisuththa Nagaraththai Dhevanidaththinindru Paralogaththaivittu Irangivarakkanden; Adhu Than Purushanukkaaga Alangarikkappatta Manavaattiyaippola Aayaththamaakkappattirundhadhu.

3 melum, Paralogaththilirundhu Undaana Oru Perunjaththaththaik Ketten; Adhu: Idho, Manushargalitaththile Dhevanudaiya Vaasasthalamirukkiradhu, Avargalidaththile Avar Vaasamaayiruppaar; Avargalum Avarudaiya Janangalaayiruppaargal, Dhevanthaame Avargalodekooda Irundhu Avargaludaiya Dhevanaayiruppaar.
4 avargaludaiya Kanneer Yaavaiyum Dhevan Thudaippaar; Ini Maranamumillai, Thukkamumillai, Alarudhalumillai, Varuththamumillai; Mundhinavaigal Ozhindhupoyina Endru Vilambinadhu.
5 singaasanaththinmel Veetrirundhavar: Idho, Naan Sagalaththaiyum Pudhidhaakkukiren Endraar. Pinnum, Avar: Indha Vasanangal Saththiyamum Unmaiyumaanavaigal, Ivaigalai Ezhudhu Endraar.
6 andriyum, Avar Ennai Nokki: Aayitru, Naan Albaavum Omegaavum, Aadhiyum Andhamumaayirukkiren. Thaagamaayirukkiravanukku Naan Jeevaththanneerootril Ilavasamaaik Koduppen.
7 jeyangollugiravan Ellaavatraiyum Sudhandhariththukkolluvaan; Naan Avan Dhevanaayiruppen, Avan En Kumaaranaayiruppaan.

8 bayappadugiravargalum, Avisuvaasigalum, Aruvaruppaanavargalum, Kolaipaadhagarum, Vibasaarakkaararum, Sooniyakkaararum, Vikkirakaaraadhanaikkaararum, Poiyar Anaivarum Irandaam Maranamaagiya Akkiniyum Gandhagamum Erigira Kadalile Pangadaivaargal Endraar.

9 pinbu, Kadaisiyaana Ezhu Vaadhaigalaal Niraindha Ezhu Kalasangalaiyudaiya Andha Ezhu Thoodharil Oruvan Ennidaththil Vandhu: Nee Inge Vaa, Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Manaiviyaagiya Manavaattiyai Unakkuk Kaanpikkiren Endru Solli,

10 peridhum Uyaramumaana Oru Parvadhaththinmel Ennai Aaviyil Kondupoi, Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyai Adaindha Erusalemaagiya Parisuththanagaram Paralogaththaivittu Dhevanidaththilirundhu Irangivarugiradhai Enakkuk Kaanbiththaan.
11 adhin Piragaasam Migavum Vilaiyuyarndha Raththinakkallaippolavum, Palinginoliyulla Vachchirakkallaippolavum Irundhadhu.
12 adharkup Peridhum Uyaramumaana Madhilum, Kizhakke Moondru Vaasalgal, Vadakke Moondru Vaasalgal, Therke Moondru Vaasalgal, Merke Moondru Vaasalgal Aagap Pannirandu Vaasalgalum Irundhana.
13 vaasalgalin Aruge Pannirandu Thoodhargalirundhaargal; Andha Vaasalgalinmel Isravel Sandhadhiyaaraagiya Pannirandu Koththiraththaarudaiya Naamangalum Ezhudhappattirundhana.
14 nagaraththin Madhilukkup Pannirandu Asthibaarak Kargalirundhana; Avaigalmel Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Pannirandu Apposthalarin Pannirandu Naamangalum Padhindhirundhana.
15 ennudane Pesinavan, Nagaraththaiyum Adhin Vaasalgalaiyum Adhin Madhilaiyum Alakkiradharku Oru Porkolaip Pidiththirundhaan.

16 andha Nagaram Sadhuramaayirundhadhu, Adhin Agalamum Neelamum Samamaayirundhadhu. Avan Andhak Kolinaal Nagaraththai Alandhaan; Adhu Panneeraayiram Sthaadhi Alavaayirundhadhu; Adhin Neelamum Agalamum Uyaramum Samamaayirundhadhu.
17 avan Adhin Madhilai Alandhapodhu, Adhu Thoodhanudaiya Alavaagiya Manusha Alavinpadiye Nootrunaarpaththunaangu Muzhamaayirundhadhu.
18 adhin Madhil Vachchirakkallaal Kattappattirundhadhu; Nagaram Thelindhapalingukku Oppaana Suththapponnaayirundhadhu.

19 nagaraththu Madhilin Asthibaarangal Sagalavidha Raththinangalinaalum Alangarikkappattirundhana; Mudhalaam Asthibaaram Vachchirakkal, Irandaavadhu Indhiraneelam, Moondraavadhu Sandhiragaandham, Naangaavadhu Maragadham,

20 aindhaavadhu Komedhagam, Aaraavadhu Padhumaraagam, Ezhaavadhu Suvarnaraththinam, Ettaavadhu Padigappachchai, Onbadhaavadhu Pushparaagam, Paththaavadhu Vaidooriyam, Padhinoraavadhu Suneeram, Pannirandaavadhu Sugandhi Ivaigale.
21 pannirandu Vaasalgalum Pannirandu Muththukkalaayirundhana; Ovvoru Vaasalum Ovvoru Muththaayirundhadhu. Nagaraththin Veedhi Thelivulla Palingupolach Suththapponnaayirundhadhu.
22 adhile Dhevaalayaththai Naan Kaanavillai; Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththarumaattukkuttiyaanavarume Adharku Aalayam.
23 nagaraththirku Velichchangodukkach Sooriyanum Sandhiranum Adharku Venduvadhillai; Dhevanudaiya Magimaiye Adhaip Piragaasippiththadhu, Aattukkuttiyaanavare Adharku Vilakku.
24 ratchikkappadugira Janangal Adhin Velichchaththile Nadappaargal Boomiyin Raajaakkal Thangal Magimaiyaiyum Ganaththaiyum Adharkulle Konduvaruvaargal
25 ange Raakkaalam Illaadhapadiyaal, Adhin Vaasalgal Pagalil Adaikkappaduvadhe Illai.
26 ulagaththaarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum Ganaththaiyum Adharkulle Konduvaruvaargal.
27 theettulladhum Aruvaruppaiyum Poiyaiyum Nadappikkiradhumaagiya Ondrum Adhil Piravesippadhillai; Aattukkuttiyaanavarin Jeevapusthagaththil Ezhudhappattavargal Maaththiram Adhil Piravesippaargal.
